resources.string: Depending on your credit card agreement, your bank may charge a fee on all foreign exchange transactions. Here you can enter that fee. It will be added on top of the calculation, so you know how much you really pay.

string-array.name: prefSummary_dataSource
string-array.item: Exchangerate.host sources the currency rates from various financial data providers and banks, including the European Central Bank. All exchange rate data are delivered in midpoint data. Midpoint rates are determined by calculating the average median rate of Bid and Ask.\nAbout 160 currencies are included.
Frankfurter.app tracks reference exchange (forex) rates published by the European Central Bank.\nAbout 30 currencies are included.

string-array.name: prefSummary_dataUpdate
string-array.item: Exchange rates are updated around midnight UTC every working day.
The data is getting updated around 16:00 CET every working day.

resources.string: Although the app is very thoroughly written and tested, there is no guarantee that the data it shows is correct. The exchange rates are provided by a third party and this app can\'t make no promise whatsoever that the data is true and up-to-date.\nAdditionally, the rates provided – still if correct – may vary from the ones used by your bank.\nLastly: Mistakes happen. Never blindly trust anyone! That being said, rest assured I wouldn\'t have released this app if I\'ve had any doubt that it works as intended.
